column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Giritt's eyes light up at your arrival.
Use the box of custom-made explosives to blow up the tempting bedrock.
Collect chunks of twinkling ore.
Deliver the chunks of twinkling ore to Giritt.

Lali-ho! Oh, you're that <Switch(PlayerParameter(71))><Case(1)>visitor</Case><Case(2)>visitor</Case><Case(3)>dwarf</Case><Case(4)>visitor</Case><Case(5)>visitor</Case><Case(6)>visitor</Case><Case(7)>visitor</Case><Case(8)>visitor</Case></Switch> from...some faraway land. Tell me, friend: do you like explosions?

...That nervous thrill when you toss a bomb you've just made? The <Emphasis>satisfaction</Emphasis> of shattering a shelf of bedrock into tiny little pieces!? I pity the poor souls who've never known such joy!

You're a worldly <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>, ain't you? Promise not to lecture me about “danger” and “scaring the beardlings” like my milksop neighbors, and I'll let you test my latest batch of explosives!

Take these beauties, and throw one at the bedrock east of the village. The explosion's a reward in itself, of course, but if you're lucky, you might also hit a seam of ore. Bring any promising chunks back to me, and I'll let you know what you've found!
Go and blow up some bedrock! There's a tempting outcrop just east of the village─toss a bomb at it, admire the destruction, then bring back any ore you find!
Well? Anything pretty left behind?
Oh! Oooh! Do you know what this is...!?

...Iron ore.
It's a bit shiny, aye, but otherwise naught special for this area.
Now, for the important part! How was the BOOM!? Wasn't it just the most amazing feeling ever!?
What will you say?
Boom!
I thought I'd lose an eye...
See! I knew you'd appreciate a good explosion!
Ugh, you sound like my mother. I thought someone like you would... Well, never mind.
Here─a few coins for the ore. Thanks for testing the bombs!
